title: Wupatki National Monument: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Food & Drink The closest restaurants to Wupatki are approximately one hour away in Flagstaff. The Western National Parks Association shop at the visitor center carries a small selection of snacks. There are also vending machines at the visitor center with snacks and drinks.        NPS Photo  Picnic Areas Inside the monument, there are picnic tables at the visitor center, the Doney Mountain parking area, and the Lomaki Pueblo parking area. There are also picnic tables at the Painted Desert Overlook between Wupatki and Sunset Crater Volcano.      Lodging As with restaurants, the nearest hotels to the park are in Flagstaff.      Camping The Coconino National Forest offers numerous camping opportunities near Wupatki and Sunset Crater National Monuments.   Bonito Campground (17 mi/27 km) Lockett Meadow Campground (26 mi/42 km) O'leary Group Campground (17 mi/27 km) Cinder Hills OHV Dispersed Camping Area (16 mi/26 km)   Contact the Coconino National Forest directly for more details.
